tutor1.name: Khethisa Lebakeng
education: Master's in Materials Engineering - University of Cape Town (UCT)
BSc in Mechanical Engineering - University of Cape Town (UCT)
sellingPoints: Breaking Down Complex Topics - I simplify difficult concepts into easy-to-understand steps.
Real-Life Examples - I connect lessons to everyday life, making learning relatable.
Interactive Learning - I encourage engagement, critical thinking, and problem-solving instead of rote memorisation.
Experience Across Academic Levels - With 6 years of tutoring experience, I have guided both high school students preparing for exams and university students tackling advanced engineering concepts.

tutor2.name: Nkopo Chaole
education: Master's in Materials Engineering - University of Cape Town (UCT)
BSc(Hons) in Materials Science - University of Cape Town (UCT)
BSc in Chemical Technology - National University of Lesotho (NUL)
sellingPoints: Expert STEM Background - Strong academic and research expertise in Math and Chemistry.
Proven Teaching Experience - Years of tutoring students at high school and university levels.
Personalized Learning Plans - Lessons tailored to individual student needs.
Exam-Focused Approach - Step-by-step explanations, problem-solving techniques, and past paper practice.

course1.title: High School Mathematics - Grade 10-12
course1.description: Comprehensive course covering algebra, trigonometry, calculus, and more, aligned with the South African curriculum.

course2.title: University Physics I
course2.description: First-year university physics covering mechanics, thermodynamics, and waves.

course3.title: Advanced Chemistry - University Level
course3.description: Comprehensive course covering organic, inorganic, and physical chemistry for university students.

resource1.title: Grade 12 Mathematics Past Papers
resource1.description: Collection of past exam papers with detailed solutions

resource2.title: Physics Formulas Cheat Sheet
resource2.description: Comprehensive cheat sheet with all important physics formulas

testimonials.text: Khethisa helped me improve my Physics grade from a C to an A in just 3 months. His real-life examples made difficult concepts much easier to understand.
Nkopo's personalized approach to Chemistry helped me pass my first-year university exams with distinction. I highly recommend her to anyone struggling with advanced chemistry concepts.

siteInfo.name: TutorMe
siteInfo.slogan: Expert tutoring for mathematics and science subjects
